tool_description: Queries comprehensive bird species database to retrieve candidate species based on geographic location, date, habitat, and seasonal occurrence patterns.

recording_date.description: Date of recording in ISO format

habitat_type.description: Habitat type: forest, grassland, wetland, urban, coastal

elevation_meters.description: Elevation of recording location in meters

search_radius_km.description: Search radius around coordinates in kilometers

include_rare_species.description: Whether to include rarely observed species

max_results.description: Maximum number of candidate species to return

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Date format error: recording_date must be in valid ISO date-time format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss).
Unknown habitat type: habitat_type must be one of 'forest', 'grassland', 'wetland', 'urban', or 'coastal'.
Search radius error: search_radius_km must be a positive number between 1 and 1000.
Results limit error: max_results must be a positive integer between 1 and 500.
usage: Provide latitude, longitude, and recording_date as required parameters. Add habitat_type and other location details for more targeted results.

candidate_species.description: List of candidate bird species names

occurrence_probabilities.description: Probability of each species occurring at location/time

seasonal_status.description: Seasonal occurrence status for each species
